block_info.label: FIR TDM
block_info.description: FIR TDM Filter targeted for AI Engines. For a filter length of 'N' and Number of TDM Channels of 'M', specify filter coefficients as a vector of 'ceil(N*M)' elements.

parameters.name: data_type
parameters.description: The type of individual data samples input to and output of the filter function
parameters.label: Input/Output data type:

parameters.name: coef_type
parameters.description: The type of individual coefficients of the filter taps
parameters.label: Filter coefficients data type:

parameters.name: num_outputs
parameters.description: The number of output ports. Windows API output an exact copy of the data. Stream API interleaves the output data with a 128-bit pattern.
parameters.label: Provide second set of output ports

parameters.name: dual_ip
parameters.description: TP_DUAL_IP allows 2 stream inputs to be connected to FIR, increasing available throughput. When set to 0, single stream input will be connected to FIR kernel, when set to 1, both input stream ports will be used.
parameters.label: Provide second set of input ports

parameters.name: fir_length
parameters.description: Specify fir length for coefficient reloading
parameters.label: Filter length:

parameters.name: shift_val
parameters.description: The power of 2 shift down applied to the accumulation of FIR before output
parameters.label: Scale output down by 2^:

parameters.name: rnd_mode
parameters.description: The rounding to be applied during the shift down stage of processing.
parameters.label: Rounding mode:

parameters.name: input_window_size
parameters.description: The number of samples in the window API used for input to the filter function. The number of samples in the output window will depend on the FIR filter parameters
parameters.label: Input window size (Number of samples):
